# Random uniform

```{r date}
date()
```


```{r packages, results='hide'}
library('gpuR')
```

```{r testStream}
Nglobal = 4
streams = clRNG:::cpp_mrg31k3pCreateStreams(Nglobal);
t(streams)
```

```{r test}
x = vclVector(length=8L, type='double')

streams2 = clRNG::runifGpu(x, streams=streams)
t(streams2)
as.vector(x)
clRNG::runifGpu(x, streams=streams2)
as.vector(x)
clRNG::runifGpu(x, streams=streams)
as.vector(x)
```

```{r hist}

x = vclVector(length=1e7L, type='double')
Nglobal = 256

system.time(clRNG::runifGpu(x, Nglobal, localSize=8))
system.time(junk <- runif(length(x)/10))

xVec = as.vector(x)

hist(xVec)

xMat = matrix(
	xVec[seq(1,Nglobal * (length(xVec) %/% Nglobal))], 
	ncol=Nglobal, byrow=TRUE)

theLim = 0.5 + 0.1*c(-1,1)
plot(as.vector(xMat[-1,1]), as.vector(xMat[-nrow(xMat),1]), xlim = theLim, ylim=theLim, pch='.')
plot(as.vector(xMat[-1,2]), as.vector(xMat[-nrow(xMat),2]), xlim = theLim, ylim=theLim, pch='.')

```
